arts.ttl: Bayern Munich vs. Juventus: Live stream, game time thread, how to watch
arts.sum: Bayern Munich takes on Juventus at home today, followed by a Frauen-Bundesliga match against Potsdam on Sunday and an away trip to face Arsenal FC next Wednesday. The FC Bayern Frauen return to UEFA Womenâ€™s Champions League action as the busy schedule to round up calendar year 2024 draws to a close.
